snippet.title: Where Does The Volume of a Cylinder Formula Come From?
snippet.description:
http://tapintoteenminds.com/2014/09/04/volume-cylinder-formula-come/ 
Learn where the Volume of a Cylinder formula comes from by starting with where the Area of a Circle (area of the base) formula comes from, then extend to the volume by extending the height from 0 up to an unknown value, h.

This is an attempt at a visual derivation of the Volume of a Cylinder to help Middle School / Intermediate Math students better understand why they are using the formulas we give them.

Useful for the Ontario Math Curriculum from Grade 8, MFM1P, MPM1D and more.
